website_summaries.verdict: The Google Pixelbook Go is a well-built and stylish ultraportable, albeit one that costs far more than most of its Chromebook brethren.

customer_reviews.title: Stunning Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: What can I say, this is a stunning Chromebook, battery life is fantastic, screen is very bright and colours are accurate, the sound is great, better than any windows laptop I have heard and on par with my 16 MacBook. This machine absolutely flies, I was worried about getting the Intel M3 and pondered on the i5 but I neediant had as its very fast.
customer_reviews.author: MR D Wakefield

customer_reviews.title: Lovely laptop - but returning.
customer_reviews.text: *Update* item returned. It is, unfortunately, not windows. Lovely aesthetics Screen mint Keyboard lovely Just cannot get away with the OS Unable to connect to android phone via bluetooth. Cannot connect to android phone via cable. Too many 3rd party apps required. Apps I.e. amazon and garmin connect do not look good- does not fill screen- almost like looking at a phone - better off using browser. Maybe i was expecting too much from it or expecting it to be as simple as a windows PC (surface pro which we have). With experience in the OS where to find things etc, it will be perfect - Maybe I'll stick with it haha!
customer_reviews.author: Jb

customer_reviews.title: Powerful enough to run Debian Linux
customer_reviews.text: Fast powerful hardware. Runs android apps Runs debian linux without problems
customer_reviews.author: Roger's Brother

customer_reviews.title: Good Notebook for surfing and using Netflix
customer_reviews.text: Solid Chromebook, I use it most for surfing the web and for streaming services such as Netflix, Youtube, Amazon Prime Video and Disney+. The batterly life is very good, so is the display and sound for its size. Also as I could not buy this product directly at the Google Store, the merchant Technical Reality delivered it to Austria very fast for a good prize without problems. Will recommend.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Lovely machine .
customer_reviews.text: So far so good . It a lovely machine . Android apps tried so far work as expected . Tried google stadia on it and had no issues . I haven't pushed it to the limits yet so whether it is worth the money or not I don't know . It is a lovely Chromebook though .
customer_reviews.author: David J Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: A breath of fresh air after a Windows laptop - super fast and both screen and keyboard are excellent
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 2 months now and it is fabulous. Light, slim, easy to use. Set up super quick as linked to myngoogle account. I work on Sharepoint and Teams and it all runs quickly and cleanly. Zoom has some functions which don't work on Chromebooks which I found out after I brought it, but I have worked around this now. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Janet R Rimmer

customer_reviews.title: Good price-quality ratio
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and good size notebook; good keyboard layout and touchscreen.
customer_reviews.author: Rolando E.

customer_reviews.title: Greatest Chromebook
customer_reviews.text: Soft back-lit keys, 16GB ram. Touch screen, very fast sleek, recommended.
customer_reviews.author: shirley martin

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I use this for my writing and I love it
customer_reviews.author: Y Tasa

customer_reviews.title: A Top Class Pixelbook
customer_reviews.text: Google pixelbook go was an excellent choice. I have the top version I believe and it performs very well, and being one of the newer chromebooks is fairly well future proofed over the next few years. Overall I am very pleases with my purchase. Alan Long, uk.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Long

customer_reviews.title: £1300 for a lpatop built on a browser, you must be mad!
customer_reviews.text: If you’re going to drop £1300 on a Pixelbook Go, you might as well buy the Pixelbook proper, with its sharper display, hybrid features and stylus support. That said, you are getting some features in the Go that just doesn’t come in the Pixelbook, like a 1080p webcam and up to two more hours of battery life.
customer_reviews.author: MRaoufOrg

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I love this laptop and I love Chrome OS, it's well built, smooth, feels really premium and the battery life is fantastic. For me it's perfect, I can surf the web, watch Netflix, do my assignments and listen to Spotify on pretty decent speakers. I've had Windows and a MacBook and this is by far my favourite ❤️👍🙂
customer_reviews.author: KAREN JAYNE S

customer_reviews.title: issues with blue tooth
customer_reviews.text: Stopped pairing devices by bluetooth (e.g. mouse earphones etc) after 1 week. Wish I knew this before I bought it and im not the only one.!!! Took 16 days to send a replacement, bluetooth does not work on that either. Im asking for a refund and looking to buy a device that works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Screen not as good as expected
customer_reviews.text: I had read reviews about this model and expected the screen to be far better than it is. The keyboard also takes some getting use to. Trackpad not as good as apple. On the plus side the touch screen is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

product_meta.title: Google Pixelbook Go 13.3" 4k Laptop (Core i7, 16GB RAM, 256GB SSD) ,Just Black,GA00526-UK
product_meta.description: The 13.3" 64GB Multi-Touch Pixelbook Go is Google's mobility-focused Chromebook designed with on-the-go users in mind. With Google Assistant built-in, it can help answer your questions, get things done, manage your schedule, and more. It's accessible via its dedicated hotkey or by voice activation using the phrase, "Ok Google". Specs-wise, it's equipped with an 8th generation Intel Core m3 processor, 8GB of RAM, and a 64GB SSD. Should you need more storage space, you'll be able to connect external storage solutions using its two USB Type-C ports.
feature_bullets: Display: 13.3" LCD touchscreen display, 4K Ultra HD Molecular Display 3840x2160 (331 ppi), 16:9 aspect ratio, 72% NTSC colour

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars8 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK
